nodes.text: A L-1g general purpose droid acted as a foreman droid operating for the Scrapper Guild on the Shipbreaking Yard of Bracca, during the early years of the Galactic Empire. In 14 BBY, the droid had under his responsibility two employees of the guild: Prauf and Cal Kestis, who called him their "boss". Together they worked on a Venator-class Star Destroyer hull. At some point, the foreman sent them to deal with a faulty hauler whose clamps were jammed, a risky job that cautioned they would be paid double for the shift.
